cryptcomp

Class CmdLineParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • cryptcomp.CmdLineParser

  • public class CmdLineParser
extends Object
    Wrapper for Apache Commons CLI library for command line usage. See Apache Commons CLI.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CmdLineParser.CCCryptoAlgo
      Supported en/decryption algorithms.
      static class  CmdLineParser.CCOptions
      Command line options available for use.

        Retrieves the array of values, if any, of an option.

        Returns:
